name: HARD BULLET
summary:
Welcome to the world of HARD BULLET.

Prepare for brutal and destructive combat where imagination is your weapon. HARD BULLET offers immersive action with endless enemies in RIDE Mode, custom rules in Sandbox Mode, and skill tests in the Arena.

Your path to brutal glory is about to begin.

Slow Motion and Tricks
Control time, perform slow-motion jumps, leg kicks, dual-wield guns, and deliver powerful punches.
